works.title: iPhone Blog
works.label: Web Design
works.description: There are a lot of web sites, reviewing mobile applications. I cannot even count how much of them I have added to my bookmarks for further reading. But mostly they do not have any filters by price, categories and etc. That was rather important for me, so I decided to create for myself a mobile news resource with an elaborate interface. During developing I have been learning in university and did not have enough time, therefore I draw an interface and sold it to a related project.
